name: Email Newsletter
short_description: Email Newsletter 1.0 is a powerful essential for small businesses or anyone who wishes to massively distribute individual HTML emails without the use of MS Outlook or other complicated tools. With Email Newsletter, any user with POP3 or IMAP can send emails with completely customizable graphics and templates. Users no longer need to rely on BCC for privacy. Each email is individually generated as if they were sent one at a time. With this simple yet useful program, your recepients can be added to a saved mailing list. The list can be chosen to be automatically loaded upon program startup. Intuitive interface allows the user to preview the design before they send the emails. Images, videos, and links can be quickly inserted using the handy "Insert" tab. Furthermore, Email Newsletter also references some complimentary 3rd-party links for you to download. Edit pre-made HTML templates speeds up time and productivity. Unlimited file attachments can be easily made with a few clicks.
summary: Email Newsletter is can mass-mail HTML emails to unlimited individuals
